Williams Lake Dirty Knobby Fun Ride Weekend  for the whole family coming up May/28-29th

The Dirty Knobby Weekend is a Family weekend featuring tonnes of events to keep kids to Masters happy.

Saturday May 28th

  • Rider Clinic

  • Lunch

  • Poker Run

  • A, B, C, and Pee-Wee loops

  • Dirty Knobby Saturday Night Banquet

  • Camping

Sunday May 29th

  • Guided Rides

  • Dual Sport Rides

Something for everyone to have fun.  This is a no pressure, social weekend for all levels of riders and kids to come out and enjoy your sport.

For more details go to WLORMA's Dirty Knobby website and see the attached poster
